actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 95-209 to increase the authorization for appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with Section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and Section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the fiscal year 1978 authorization for the Nuclear Regulatory Commission by increasing from $22,090,000 to $24,790,000 the amount authorized for nuclear materials safety and safeguards.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 95-209 to increase the authorization for appropriations to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission in accordance with Section 261 of the Atomic Energy Act of 1954, as amended, and Section 305 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974, as amended, and for other purposes.
